name: SS Ingrid Leonhardt (1944-1945)
author: Daniel Zwick
body:
Historie

The INGRID LEONHARDT was built in 1944 by the Rickmers Reismühlen Rhederei & Schiffbau A.G. shipyard in Bremerhaven for the Hamburg-based Leonhardt & Blumberg company. The ship was lost on 22 April 1945 when she struck a sea-mine in Fehmarn Belt.

Beschrijving

The scattered remains of the wrecksite were captured by Erhard Schulz.

Lengte280 ½ voet (85,5 m)

Status

The wrecksite is located in the German EEZ and thus is not protected by law.

Referenties

  • wrecksite.eu.
    SS Ingrid Leonhardt [+1945].
